page.title: 11TRENT VALLEY
page.content: The A34 trunk road is used by the Potteries Motor Traction Company (P.M.T.), and runs regular service between Stone and Stoke_on_Trent. Approximately twenty_six bus routes per day use this section of the road The London tom Manchester railway line is used on average by 80 _ 100 trains per day, both passenger and freight. Approximately 60% of this total is passenger transport and the rest freight traffic. The Trent and Mersey Canal with a towing path all along its length, provides a recreational area and a tourist amenity, as the canal is full of pleasure craft in the summer,there being a local boatyard just off the grid reference. It is also well used by the local fishing club. There is a large distribution depot for lorries situated on the A34.
